description: Outside doesn’t stop because it’s cold. And now you don’t even need to stop to lace up your boots to get out into it. Step into the go-anywhere, do-anything, heat-trapping, water-stopping, slip-resistant, best damn winter boot made … that now slips on.
name: Keen Revel IV Chelsea - Mens

specs.value: Three layers of heat-trapping materials underfoot
With 200 grams of KEEN.WARM Recycled P.E.T. insulation rated to -25°F, plus three layers of heat-trapping materials underfoot, warmth stays inside the boot
The KEEN.DRY waterproof breathable membrane is like a bootie that seals out moisture
The KEEN.Polar Traction outsole has microscopic shards in the rubber to dig into icy surfaces for better grip
A proprietary waterproof, breathable membrane that lets vapor out without letting water in
Their signature insulation is extremely compressible and light for the foot warmth it provides, and it retains its insulating ability, even when damp
A tri-layer footbed used in KEEN.Warm insulated work boots that captures warmth and provides underfoot comfort
